website_summaries.verdict: A mid-range priced pair of heated socks that work more often than not, though some battery or charger issues may occur.
pros: Comfortable socks with 3 heat settings that get up to 6 hours of battery life on the lowest setting
Can be worn by men and women
cons: A few pairs with faulty batteries that wouldn't charge have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Keeps feet warm.
customer_reviews.text: Like the 2 settings. I have a toe that is sensitive to the cold so i need to keep my feet warm when I blow snow. Worked great the couple of times I used them. Feet were warm for over an hour after ladt big storm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally warm toes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for my ice cube toes. They get so cold and we tried all kinds of socks, slippers, etc. These do the trick! There are three settings and I usually use the lowest and can relax with warm feet finally! I highly recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rechargability is a Big Plus
customer_reviews.text: These socks are good for warming the tops of your feet near your toes. Because the elements are on top, they will probably last longer than if they were on the bottom. However, I wished they did warm the bottoms of my feet. They are comfortable to wear and are high enough that the battery pocket will not interfere with boots. I like that the batteries are rechargable so that I don't have the waste of disposable batteries. I had some issues with my order but Rabbitroom has EXCEPTIONAL customer service. They want you to be happy with their products.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Dado

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Had a few hiccups that I might ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had a few hiccups that I might have been able to leave with. But seller proactively reached out and said they had a few with quality issues. They sent a replacement and it works great. Good product great service.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Good value heated socks
customer_reviews.text: I got this for working out outdoors in Milwaukee and they worked well at 10 degrees. The highest setting wasn't super hot, but it was enough to keep my toes defrosted until I could get my own body heat into the equation for at least an hour. I haven't tested them at colder temperatures, but would assume they would do better in boots than my tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great so far
customer_reviews.text: just went out hunting today (<30 degrees, 10mph wind, rain/snow, 4 hours) had them on medium with a cheap pair of wool socks and cheap thin insulated boots and it kept my toes perfect, not sweating but not at all cold. i cant speak for how long they last but my toes are horrible and they would normally be completely numb within that time so these are definitely going to be lifesavers
customer_reviews.author: Chad william Stephens

customer_reviews.title: poor product
customer_reviews.text: disappointing with product overall. Doesn't appear to heat very well and even on lowest setting, they lost charge in about three hours. Couldn't feel any heat around toes when wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Harold B.

customer_reviews.title: Feet were warm
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They kept my feet warm and toasty while I was out training. I give it 4 stars for two reasons. 1) battery life is only about 3 hours. 2) haven’t been able to find replacement batteries. That would be very handy to have so you can switch them out. But all in all a great product
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I used in the military
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I used in the military, prefect fit and does the purpose, only a couple hours that’s the reason I give it 4 stars, otherwise I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: AMAZÓNICO

customer_reviews.title: Stings your feet more then it warms them. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this product. They never got warm enough to warm my feet completely and it take a very long time to charge the battery. Used for a couple hours then shut them off for the night when I went to use them the next morning the batteries were dead and it took several hours to recharge them. Not good when your feet are very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heat?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about these. Took so long to charge the first time and one sock seemed to get warm, the other not so much. Not sure the product is worth what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: JennE

customer_reviews.title: Soooo disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Left sock was only slightly warm. Right sock didn't even get warm at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm but can be uncomfotable if laying down.
customer_reviews.text: battery in the sock is a little bulky and can be uncomfortable if laying on your side.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Electric Sox
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a Christmas give for my son in law, and he loves them. Mother in law scored many brownie points with the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Mizell

customer_reviews.title: I only need them on the lowest temperature setting.
customer_reviews.text: I love the socks. There comfortable and keep my feet very warm at work in the freezer at my job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described. Used them ice fishing. Waited until my feet got cool. Turned them on and they warmed my feet quickly. Also comfortable walking in. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Battery on but no heat
customer_reviews.text: Really sad mine do not work😭 Nice socks.the battery 🔋 is on I went through all 3 cycles of heat that it offers. The socks give off no heat at all.
customer_reviews.author: kevin a.

customer_reviews.title: temperature and charge
customer_reviews.text: Hot too hot. Medium not hot enough. Battery does not las thru night.
customer_reviews.author: drj

customer_reviews.title: Didnt keep feet warm
customer_reviews.text: They dont get vary warm my toes still got cold
customer_reviews.author: corey richards

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than expected. You need to offer extra batteries for those long cold days afield. On low they lasted about 6 hours. All in all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P.

customer_reviews.title: Money Worth
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable an definitely keep you warm in winter time. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A Arizola

customer_reviews.title: These things are great, no more numb toes
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for 2 months now with no issues. These things are great, no more numb toes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Huston

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time on this product I give it a thumbs down 👎
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a worthless product
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous negative reviews about heated socks in general, I decided to give this one a try. I actually bought 4 brands from Amazon at the same time, all of them turned out to be worthless - i.e I felt almost zero heat on most of the brands, including this one.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Garg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Thick sock but it’s not worth it. The battery only last 15mins then your feet is cold. Charge don’t last. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not overly impressed, but I’m not sending them back, either.
customer_reviews.text: These are a meh from me. I’m not blown away, nor am I disappointed. They don’t feel like they warm my feet as much as I anticipated. I was also thinking they would have a larger warming area. They do seem to do the job, though. So no real complaints. I haven’t had an issue charging batteries. For those complaining or wondering why their LEDs don’t turn green, the LEDs on the batteries don’t change. The one on the actual wall plug is the one that changes (see picture). This wasn’t in the instructions, though. I just happen to notice it when I realized the ones on the batteries weren’t going to change after charging overnight.
customer_reviews.author: cooksa

customer_reviews.title: Battery is not uncomfortable at all - I like the different settings - very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pair for my husband and I for hunting and what a difference! Now, we won't go hunting without them...totally spoiled us. Makes it easier to stay put for longer. Battery is not uncomfortable at all - I like the different settings - very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: Loved these socks!
customer_reviews.text: Used for skiing and wasn't sure how well they'd work. Turns out that they provided more heat than I expected. I purchased an extra set of battery packs, but didn't need them for a day on the mountain. I'm curious how the batteries will be for the next season...and not sure if they'll be ok to be dormant for the summer and fall, but I guess time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: DCinCT

customer_reviews.title: Very thick and well made, working as described
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Can't feel any wires. I charged the batteries for about 4 hours. On the high setting it seems like it heats for at least 3 hours. I could be wrong because I fell asleep while testing them. So far it feels like an electric blanket on feet. I have no doubt that when I wear them with snow shoes they will do their job even better.
customer_reviews.author: timework

customer_reviews.title: Can't be happier
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these, she says that they work well but but people must remember that they are feet warmers and not to expect a super hot heat. The retailer was fast and responsive, the socks arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Update.....I cannot feel any heat and I am very disappointed. Was really looking forward to warm feet when ...
customer_reviews.text: this is an update on my review. Emily at Rabbitroom is terrific. I explained that I couldn't feel any heat from the socks. she promptly sent me another pair and they work. the heat is on the top of your foot and definitely keeps your feet warm. I'm assuming the first pair was defective and it was remedied quickly. I have tried these socks 4 times snow blowing the driveway. I cannot feel any heat and I am very disappointed. Was really looking forward to warm feet when I'm out in the snow. I recharged a number of times thinking that was the issue but no. never did work and I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne L. Houston

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: These socks were a gift for my Dad, who did not get a chance to wear them. Although I had to return them, I would have kept them if I knew someone who could use heated socks. They arrived neatly boxed, professionally packaged with instructions enclosed. The socks were soft and thick....just exactly what I ordered and the price was reasonable, compared to some other top-notch brands.
customer_reviews.author: maryjane

customer_reviews.title: Not very warm
customer_reviews.text: Used them for duck hunting inside my rubber boots in 50 degree weather. Did not keep my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Socks to warm your feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these socks at night to keep his feet warm so he can sleep through the night. They are well made and the battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing comfortable socks! Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: My feet are very cold and sensitive so I tried these out. They are great socks! I can’t feel the wires in them and the sock itself is very nice. I learned I like to wear these even better when I use a sock liner or thin sock under this heated sock. The heat is perfect!! I’m so pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ALLISON GILMORE

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Hunt These Sox are great!!all day when your feet are cold after an hour
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Not too Hot , just warm and keep my feet on the game
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When they worked..they were great
customer_reviews.text: My feet are always cold. Ordered these for some relief. Worked 3 times..and then..one would not recharge. Sent them back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great heat
customer_reviews.text: These do a great job just wish the battery would last longer
customer_reviews.author: Seth ruck

customer_reviews.title: Nice Socks
customer_reviews.text: These are nice socks for the price. I look forward to wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean PDX

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for cold weather. So nice to not have my feet freeze when I'm outside working.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Saved this Cali girl from -10!
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for these socks.. immediately charged them and put them on- oh my god, my feet are SO happy... I'm a California girl having her first winter in New England and my feet are always cold unless it's like 90 degrees out. These socks are wicked awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Fausta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outside activities
customer_reviews.text: Used these heated socks for several all day outside activities. The weather was close to zero degrees. They lasted all day and kept my feet VERY comfortable. I was thrilled they were such a reasonable price and worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: They are so small! My son couldn’t get them even half way on. Can’t find out if they work when you can’t get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Patty A Agee

customer_reviews.title: Good socks for cold feet,but batteries do not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife,who has chronic cold feet and she loves them.The last pair the wire pulled out of the sock in less than two months.The are much better made. Update: One battery will not hold a charge.I bought these in March.Cannot find contact info for vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty 3317

customer_reviews.title: After wearing them 5 times one sock stopped working; ...
customer_reviews.text: After wearing them 5 times one sock stopped working; i washed them with my hands and did not squeeze them to take water out; so we can't say that something happened in the washing machine. I am a hunter and these stocks are not for a temperature from 40 and below. You can wear them inside the house I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Kashif M Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Sox don’t seem to heat correctly after being charged-charger light ...
customer_reviews.text: Sox don’t seem to heat correctly after being charged-charger light never turns green during charging regardless of charging overnight or four hours. Company refunded the entire purchase price after complaint. Could be a light problem on charging unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Breeding/ Chuck Breeding

customer_reviews.title: "sock" singular) warmed up nicely but only one of them produced any heat
customer_reviews.text: The sock (yes, "sock" singular) warmed up nicely but only one of them produced any heat. Probably decent if they both worked. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Watch out! It has the ability to burn your feet if you fall asleep with them on. Blisters!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Switch doesn't work on one of them.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my Dad who’s battling terminal cancer. The switch on one of them doesn’t work but other than that it would be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Charging issues
customer_reviews.text: I’m having trouble charging the batteries. I’ve been charging the batteries overnight. Still not charged after 20 hours. It says to turn battery on to charge but there is no indicator that they are on when charging. Finally plugged in the batteries and no heat was generated. The pair I received don’t heat up at all, even when on high!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Beiswenger

customer_reviews.title: Not what i was hopeing for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Cant hardly tell they are heated,need to test with my infared red temperature gun to see the actual temp.Lights and controls are s bit confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: THEY DON'T GET WARM
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my mother for a gift. By the time I gave them to her and she charged them and tried them out the return window had closed and they didn't even work. We charged them and turned them on, and they didn't get warm even the first time that I used them. I would not recommend getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Reed M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea.....bad product
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for a pair of socks that would keep my feet warm. Unfortunately, these aren't the socks to do it. They just don't perform as expected. Little else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Batteries would not charge.
customer_reviews.text: I had the same problem as another reviewer. I plugged in the batteries to charge them, and after 20 hours the LEDs were still red. Tried connecting them to the socks anyway, and no heat. I'm returning them today.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brawn

customer_reviews.title: Feet stayed cold!
customer_reviews.text: Thought would get warmer!! My feet still got cold and they were charged fully.. I was excited to use them but they did not keep my feet warm. Maybe I got a bad pair!! But for what I paid for a pair of socks my feet should not of got as cold as they did.. I tried them at home too hey warmed up very minimally... hope the company will replace for me to try another set!!! Was definitely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY A CHRISTIANSON

customer_reviews.title: battery life 6 hours on low setting
customer_reviews.text: 1 sock did not work the other only worked for about 6 hours
customer_reviews.author: reeftank313

customer_reviews.title: Almost impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wore these twice one battery won’t charge at all....worked great the 1st time. Now it’s usless. Same battery issue as previously mentioned. They where given to me as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

product_meta.title: Rabbitroom Electric Heated Socks Thick Knitting Thermal Sox Winter Warm Cotton Crew Socks
feature_bullets: Thick Knitting Thermal Socks Care Chronically Cold Feet
Premium quality：Made of cotton polyester spandexmaterial, thick super breathable and wear-resisting.L Size Heated Socks:B07N2LHQQR

Long-life performance: Electric heating socks powered with a 3.7V rechargeable Li-ion battery (two batteries included in the package), lasting for 5-6 hours. After the battery runs out, connect it with the charger to the socket, it takes 4-5 hours for fully charged when the light turn from red to green. No more feeling cold !
Cleaning method:Recommend hands wash gently. Make sure take out the battery and put socks in a laundry bag before washing.
Keep feet warm: Suitable for all kinds of outdoor activities like skiing, fishing, Jogging, hunting, Cycling, hiking and so on. And they can promote blood circulation

Perfect gift: Serves as a warm gift for your parents and friends, this is the best choice to keep your feet warm in harsh winter. 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE If you have any question about these heated socks like charging or battery issue, please contact us before leaving a review, we will solve it quickly and in the best way!
